title: RPG Style LevelUp Mod
description: RPG Style LevelUp is a Minecraft mod that adds RPG-style leveling mechanics to the game. It allows players to gain experience points and level up their character, unlocking new perks as they progress. The mod is designed to reward players for their time and effort in the game, providing a sense of progression and customization. The mod is purely server sided and does not require anything from joining players. It is built using Java and is compatible with the Fabric mod-loader.
